title: Street Fighter II logo ID or something similar please
content:
I'm in need of a font that is similar to this one used in the video game Street Fighter II. I'm pretty certain that this font is hand drawn but any suggestions would be greatly appreciated. Many thanks in advance!

Andrea

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [stf\_m002.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023171124/http:/typophile.com/files/stf_m002.gif) | 9.2 KB |
author: andi emery

comments.content:
Did you check Blambot and Comicraft? Highly probable you'll find similar styles there.  
 [http://www.blambot.com/fonts.shtml](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023171124/http:/www.blambot.com/fonts.shtml "http://www.blambot.com/fonts.shtml")  
 [http://www.comicbookfonts.com/home.html?sid=0001JTJ2cIS7QDsWYc0Y6H5](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023171124/http:/www.comicbookfonts.com/home.html?sid=0001JTJ2cIS7QDsWYc0Y6H5 "http://www.comicbookfonts.com/home.html?sid=0001JTJ2cIS7QDsWYc0Y6H5")  
. . .  
Bert Vanderveen BNO

Thanks for the lead, Bert - much appreciated!

Andrea
